sub_fields.label: Top Table Headings
sub_fields.name: top_table_headings
sub_fields.instructions: These will be the top item headings for each column. If you want the first column to be empty simply add an empty cell for the first item.

sub_fields.label: Main Table Content
sub_fields.name: main_table_content_advanced
sub_fields.instructions: The cell content will wrap down to the next row based on the number of items you created in the above section. IE: Top Table Headings = Blue, Yellow, Green meaning there will be 3 columns in this table.
